# Output Directory
Motion data JSON files will be saved here after extraction.

These files contain:
- Frame-by-frame pose landmarks
- 2D normalized coordinates
- 3D world coordinates (in meters)
- Visibility scores for each landmark
- Video metadata (FPS, resolution, frame count)

## Generated Files:
- `sample_motion.json` - Test animation created by test_setup.py
- Your extracted motion files will appear here after running extract_pose.py
